text:
Hey #Makie, I am fighting a bit in having a Node contain a function which is the background image and should update from level to level. I get errors
```ERROR: LoadError: MethodError: Cannot `convert` an object of type 
  var"#1409#1410"{typeof(logdensity2),Bool{}} to an object of type 
  var"#1409#1410"{typeof(logdensity1),Bool{}}```
Because the function is not the same type
